package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: A C++ port of Lucene
package-manager.vendor: Itamar Syn-Hershko, Ben van Klinken, et.al.
package-manager.description: CLucene is a C++ port of the popular Apache Lucene search engine (http://lucene.apache.org/java). CLucene aims to be a high-speed alternative to Java Lucene, its API is very similar to that of the Java version. CLucene has recently been brought up to date with Lucene 2.3.2. It contains most of the same functionality as the Java version.
